home.text1: The Official Website of Lastand Development.
home.text2: Here you can find all my projects and programs, straight from the developer.
home.hello: Welcome to the official website of Lastand Development.
home.description1: I am currently working on two projects that are both available for download: Meteor Extinction, my very first game which I develop using the Unity Engine, and Wooden GUI, a resource pack for Minecraft, which enhances the Graphical User Interface (GUI).
home.description2: If you want to tell me your opinion on my projects, do not hesitate to contact me via GitHub or by sending me a mail.
home.description3: I hope you enjoy both Meteor Extinction and Wooden GUI!
home.meteorExtinctionDescription: The arcade game by Lastand Development. Protect the earth from meteors and buy upgrades to destroy more meteors!
home.woodenGUIDescription: The resource pack by Lastand Development for Minecraft: Java Edition. Enjoy a fully wood-based Minecraft interface!

contact.title: Contact
contact.emailAddress: If you want to contact me, please send an email to the following email address:
contact.issueReport: If you want to report an issue or create a feature request for this website or Meteor Extinction and you have a GitHub account, please consider creating an issue on GitHub in the corresponding repository.
contact.noGitHub: Otherwise, please fill in the template to report an issue.

issueTemplate.title: Report an Issue
issueTemplate.fillEverything: Please fill in all the fields.
issueTemplate.requestFeedback: I would like to receive feedback on my report.

meteorExtinctionHome.text1: Meteor Extinction is the first game by Lastand Development!
meteorExtinctionHome.description: The goal of the game is to prevent meteors from hitting the earth using a shield and rockets. There's a freeplay mode where you can try to beat your or your friend's highscore and a level mode where upgrades can be purchased to help you master increasingly difficult levels.

woodenGUIHome.text1: Wooden GUI is a resource pack for Minecraft: Java Edition.
woodenGUIHome.description: It brings a cozy wood look to all of Minecraft's user interface. It is vibrant and optimized for optimal item visibility. Furthermore, Wooden GUI fits perfectly with the vanilla textures of Minecraft, as it is based on them.
woodenGUIHome.betaWarning: It is still a beta version. Especially in the later survival game, some menus that have not yet been edited can be found. Therefore, the resource pack will be updated regularly.

changelogAlpha01.p1: Basic Gameplay: Shield to defend the Earth, Meteors falling, Rockets available after 10 points
changelogAlpha01.p2: Main Menu to start the Game

changelogAlpha011.p1: Added ability to pause the game (ESC key)
changelogAlpha011.p2: Added ability to stop or restart the game
changelogAlpha011.p4: Added display of the text "New Highscore" when the highscore is broken
changelogAlpha011.p5: Bugs with the way buttons and scores have been displayed on different aspect ratios have been fixed

changelogAlpha012.p1: Crosshair is built in as a native mouse pointer, so it's more direct, no longer lags behind, and can be displayed over the score
changelogAlpha012.p2: Fixed a bug that sometimes prevented the remaining attempts from being displayed correctly after restarting the game in the pause menu
changelogAlpha012.p3: Fixed a bug that occurred when app info was opened and then closed again very quickly
changelogAlpha012.p4: Fixed a bug that prevented the correct crosshair from being displayed during the countdown if the game ended while being paused

warning.MCnotAvailableForOS: Minecraft: Java-Edition cannot be run on

404.ohno: Oh no! This site has been hit by a meteor!
404.notfound: We could not find it! Maybe there is a typo in your URL...
404.fix: But don't worry! Just click the button below, and you will be protected against meteors!
404.issue: If you are certain that there should be content here, for example because you saw this after clicking a button on my website, please consider reporting this error.
